subject: Automobile Racing
Automobiles
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Nascar’s Car of Tomorrow has been billed as a safety upgrade that will lower costs and make races more competitive. But crews are questioning some of those very issues.
snippet: Nascar’s Car of Tomorrow has been billed as a safety upgrade that will lower costs and make races more competitive. But crews are questioning some of those very issues.
